SpriteFactory.Sprite.castShadows

Property: Read/Write

C#: bool castShadows
JS: castShadows : bool

Description
Does the Sprite cast shadows? Changing this setting affects all Mesh Renderers in the Sprite.

See Also
shadowCastingMode
receiveShadows
